  • Method Details

    • execute

      default boolean execute(Command command) throws CommandException, DatabaseException
      This method is an abstraction for single command execution method
      Parameters:
      command - command, that should be executed
      Returns:
      command execution status
      Throws:
      CommandException - if something went wrong during command execution
      DatabaseException - if something went wrong during database operations
      DefaultExecutorException - if something went wrong during command execution

    • execute

      default boolean execute(List<Command> script) throws CommandException, DatabaseException
      This method is an abstraction for commands script execution method
      Parameters:
      script - script to be executed
      Returns:
      script execution status
      Throws:
      CommandException - if something went wrong during command execution
      DatabaseException - if something went wrong during database operations
      DefaultExecutorException - if something went wrong during command script execution
